Events

  • dragItemPositioned
  • fitComplete
  • layoutComplete
  • removeComplete

Packery is an Event Emitter. You can bind listeners to events with the on, off, and once methods.

var $container = $('#container').packery({...});

function onLayout() {
  console.log('layout done');
}
// bind event listener
$container.packery( 'on', 'layoutComplete', onLayout );
// un-bind event listener
$container.packery( 'off', 'layoutComplete', onLayout );
// bind event listener to be triggered just once
$container.packery( 'once', 'layoutComplete', function() {
  console.log('layout done, just this one time');
});

dragItemPositioned

$container.packery( 'on', 'dragItemPositioned', function( draggedItem ) {...} )
// or with vanilla JS
pckry.on( 'dragItemPositioned', function( draggedItem ) {...} )
  • draggedItem

    Type: Packery.Item

    the dragged item that was positioned

Triggered after a drag end, only when an item is positioned, either into a row or column, or into its container element. This event is triggered after the positioning transition has ended.

// set up Packery and Draggabillies
// like the bindDraggabillyEvents demo, then...
$container.packery( 'on', 'dragItemPositioned',
  function( draggedItem ) {
    notify( 'Packery positioned dragged ' + draggedItem.element.nodeName );
  }
);

Edit this example on CodePen or vanilla JS example

fitComplete

$container.packery( 'on', 'fitComplete', function( item ) {...} )
// or with vanilla JS
pckry.on( 'fitComplete', function( item ) {...} )
  • item

    Type: Packery.Item

    items that was fit

Triggered after an item element is fit.

$container.packery( 'on', 'fitComplete',
  function( item ) {
    notify( 'fit ' + item.element.className );
  }
);

Click item to fit it at 40, 40

Edit this example on CodePen or vanilla JS example

layoutComplete

$container.packery( 'on', 'layoutComplete', function( laidOutItems ) {...} )
// or with vanilla JS
pckry.on( 'layoutComplete', function( laidOutItems ) {...} )
  • laidOutItems

    Type: Array of Packery.Items

    items that were laid out

Triggered after a layout and all positioning transitions have been completed.

$container.packery( 'on', 'layoutComplete',
  function( laidOutItems ) {
    console.log('Packery layout completed on ' +
      laidOutItems.length + ' items');
  }
);

Resize browser or click item to toggle size

Edit this example on CodePen or vanilla JS example

removeComplete

pckry.on( 'removeComplete', function( removedItems ) {...} )
// or with vanilla JS
$container.packery( 'on', 'removeComplete', function( removedItems ) {...} )

Triggered after an item element has been removed.

  • removedItems

    Type: Array of Packery.Items

    items that were removed

$container.packery( 'on', 'removeComplete',
  function( removedItems ) {
    console.log( 'Removed ' + removedItems.length + ' items' );
  }
);

Click items to remove them

Edit this example on CodePen or vanilla JS example
